explains: v. 安装，装配；（计算机）配置，设定

sentences.en: How easy was it to configure the software?
sentences.cn: 配置该软件有多容易呢？

sentences.en: After you have successfully installed these products, you must next configure demo environments.
sentences.cn: 在你成功安装这些产品之后，接下来你必须配置演示环境。

sentences.en: But you need to configure it.
